prodDetails.span001: Our products provide environmental, social and economic benefits while protecting public health and environment, throughout their life cycle, from exctraction of raw materials until final disposal

prodPrice.prodVat: Additional VAT may apply; charged at checkout

footer.about002: Our company has been created with sustainability in mind. We care about the enviroment and we produce our products in the most responsible ways possible. Our mission is to make quality products without compromise

user.yourName: Hell and welcome!, what is your
user.name: name

contact.title001: Contact us here on site or:
contact.submitReq: Got a question or a request? Contact us!

facts.weWish: We want the best for the environment!
facts.becuaseWe: Because we think so much about the environment, our products are produced slower than conventional products. Our leather has to bathe basins of water and bark instead of chemical solutions.
facts.ourTextile: Our fabrics are made of organic and sustainable materials such as bamboo, hemp, organic cotton, etc. We constantly strive to develop and produce the most sustainable products we can, in the most sustainable way - for you, for me and for all of us.
facts.weTakeOur: We get our inspiration from a well-balanced mix of the 1920’s classic expressions and the modern and stylish London.
facts.ourMissionIs: Our mission is to create products for the fashionable man who does not compromise his appearance, but who also wants the best for the environment and the future. All our leather goods are handmade to provide the highest quality in every product
facts.codeOfConductAnd: The Code of Conduct and Corporate Social Responsibilities cover a number of different requirements that we set for ourselves and our sub-suppliers
facts.li2: No discrimination or violation of human and labor rights
facts.li3: The local law must be upheld
facts.li4: Healthy working environment and facilities for employees
facts.li6: Fire extinguishers, emergency procedures and exercises
facts.li7: Handling, gloves and masks for chemicals
facts.li9: Working hours and wages must comply with applicable law
facts.li10: First Aiders, Fire Training Trained, etc. must be at the factory
facts.li11: Environmental considerations, including waste water treatment, pollution etc.
facts.handlingOf: Handling chemicals is a very important element when producing products in the East. It is of course about both the environment, but also the safety of our end-consumers.
facts.inEurope: In Europe, we obviously have a lot of regulations including a chemical legislation called REACH regulation. REACH is based on a around a sea of studies and has set rules and laws for handling chemicals in production and end products. This basically means that do not use any:
facts.li15: Alkylphenol, Alkulphenol ethoxylates (APEO, environmentally harmful substances)
facts.li16: Heavy metals in metal parts (zippers, studs etc.)
facts.toStartWith: Originally, I started this business in the hope that I could do something that would make a difference for our environment.
facts.fastI: I quickly reached a conclusion about making accessories and clothes for the fashion-conscious man. A huge amount of time was spent on ideas and conversations with different manufacturers, but eventually I found those who shared the same visions as myself.
facts.nowAllOur: Now all our products are made under sustainable conditions, with strict chemical requirements as well as working conditions for the employees in the factories.
facts.weAreStill: We are still a very young company, but I believe that my idea and business are of great potential and we are constantly working on high pressure to achieve the best solutions and results for all our projects both now and in the future.
